description: Fetches mapping details for the specified Amazon EMR Studio and identity (user or group).

parameters.name: StudioId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon EMR Studio.

parameters.name: IdentityType
parameters.description: Specifies whether the identity to fetch is a user or a group.

nested_items.name: SessionMapping
nested_items.description: The session mapping details for the specified Amazon EMR Studio and identity, including session policy ARN and creation time.

nested_items.name: StudioId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: IdentityId
nested_items.description: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the user or group.

nested_items.name: IdentityName
nested_items.description: The name of the user or group. For more information, see UserName and DisplayName in the IAM Identity Center Identity Store API Reference.

nested_items.name: IdentityType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the identity mapped to the Amazon EMR Studio is a user or a group.

nested_items.name: SessionPolicyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the session policy associated with the user or group.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the session mapping was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time the session mapping was last modified.
